jobDescription: As a People Partner Leader you will Work with our Chief Product & Business Operations Officer and broader leadership team to identify, build and execute HR strategies to meet Funding Circles business objectives. You will understand the critical business and technology priorities and proactively develop a People agenda that supports the business as it continues to grow while incorporating our values and adding to the strength of our culture. Your People agenda will include partnership across the People Team to deliver initiatives globally on performance management, organizational design, change management, managerial & leadership development, total rewards, culture & engagement and diversity & inclusion.  You must be able to anticipate needs, diagnose problems, identify and drive appropriate solutions while collaborating well across a global matrixed environment. You know how to coach, mentor and advise at all levels of the organization. With senior leadership, you will bring and elicit the critical thinking necessary for navigating complex people situations. You thrive in a fast-paced environment and naturally apply data and analytics to help inform trends, identify appropriate interventions and measure impact. As a People Partner Lead, you will report directly to the Chief People Officer and be a member of the People Leadership Team committed to building a best in class People function.
